div.h2: Ridgeline Academy is closed per state recommendations. Classes continue online. Read below for more information about what we are doing during COVID-19.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

img.alt: Donate goods to our foundation's vulnerable families (1).png
Donate goods to our foundation's vulnerable families (1).png

div.h3: Free breakfast and lunch for all kids aged 18 and younger
div.p: Come to Ridgeline Academy for a drive-through meal service for all kids aged 18 and younger. Both breakfast and lunch can be picked up at the same time, 11:00 am - 12:00 pm Monday - Friday.
For parents who need childcare, Innovation Learning has extended their hours at Ridgeline. See flyer for more details and sign up at innovationlearning.com.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none
image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Ridgeline Academy continues to offer classes via distance learning. Contact your child’s teacher for specific information about their class.
